title: Looking to trade t206 EPDGs - TRADED
author: David R

posts.post_title: Looking to trade t206 EPDGs - TRADED
posts.post_content:
I am looking to trade for a t206 EPDG HOFer SGC 40-60.  I have these EPDGs to trade:  

Schlei catching SGC 60
Mullin horiz SGC 60
Chase white cap SGC 50
Jennings portrait SGC 30
Donlin seated SGC 50  

I also have a Piedmont 150 McGraw portrait no hat SGC 30 available.  

Please email me at [url]dreis114@hotmail.com[/url].

Also looking to buy or trade for a t206 HOFer with a Carolina Brights, Lenox, AB 350 frame, or Tolstoi back.

I have several available. im interested in all of the epdgs you have if you want you can browse my set on sgc registry name: The impossible or you can check my ebay store thecardboardkings.
Please let me know if you find anything that tickles your fancy.
